description:
We offer a unique free offline Bible study tool that you can learn and share the Holy Bible on your own or with your trusted bible study group. Comparing to traditional Holy Bible, our e-bible allows you to access Holy Bible easily on your digital devices without carrying paper book around, listen to Bible verses while driving and running, or take challenges of biblical quizzes and crosswords. 

Our KJV Bible App is a Fast, light, free offline bible for your daily study. It allows you to quickly locate Holy Bible verse with a simple tap and create your own Holy Bible verse highlights, bookmark and verse picture.

Please join our virtual bible study group to explore Bible with more than 10 million people who have downloaded our KJV Holy Bible App worldwide. Get yourself closer to God and listen to God's word at any time by using our pocket Holy Bible App.

----Feature ----

BEST AUDIO FOR BIBLE PLAN
-Various Bible verse audio of King James Version KJV.
-Classic bible plan audio that you can listen to God's word.
-Listen to your favorite Bible verses whenever you are unable to read while driving, running and strolling.
-Let God's word put you to sleep at night.

THE BEST BIBLE STUDY TOOL
-Access to Holy Bible anytime anywhere just by swiping screen.
-Offline Bibles: Read and study Bible verse WITHOUT internet access.
-Search the Bible with keywords.
-Quickly locate verse.
-Share your Bible verse with your friends anytime anywhere with ease.
-Highlight verses you like for future bible study.
-Note your inspirations.
-Have fun with our selected bible quizzes and crosswords challenges.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR FREE BIBLE
-Font adjustment: choose any font size and line spacings you want.
-Night mode: change to night mode when you read the Bible at night.
-Share verses with your friends via social platforms with ease.
-Verses Image: Customize fantastic Bible verse images.

READ BIBLE DAILY
-Connect to God's word with our one-of-a-kind pocket Holy Bible App.
-Fantastic Bible reading experience.
-Use this free Bible for your daily devotional study and Christian Bible reading.
-Read with your religious community and share your thoughts together.

All over the world, local libraries offer millions of ebooks and audiobooks. You can borrow them — for free, instantly — with a library card and Libby: the award-winning, much-loved app for libraries. 

• Browse your library’s digital catalog of books — from classics to NYT best-sellers
• Borrow and enjoy ebooks, audiobooks, and magazines
• Download titles for offline reading, or stream them to save space
• Send ebooks to your Kindle (U.S. libraries only)
• Listen to audiobooks via Apple CarPlay
• Use tags to create your must-read list and any other book lists you want
• Keep your reading position automatically synced on all your devices 

In our beautiful, intuitive ebook reader:
• Adjust text size, background color, and book design
• Zoom into magazines and comic books
• Define and search for words and phrases
• Read and listen to read-alongs with your kids
• Add bookmarks, notes, and highlights 

In our ground-breaking audio player:
• Slow down or speed up the audio (0.6 to 3.0x)
• Set a sleep timer
• Simply swipe to skip forward and backward
• Add bookmarks, notes, and highlights 

Libby is built by the team at OverDrive, in support of local libraries everywhere. 

Happy reading!

Marvel Unlimited is the premier subscription service to access over 30,000 digital comics.

Marvel Unlimited features all of your favorite characters from Marvel movies, TV shows, and video games. Read the comic books that inspired your favorite super heroes and villains on the big screen! Start your free 7-day trial today!

Experience the all-new digital comic format, Marvel’s Infinity Comics available exclusively on Marvel Unlimited. Featuring in-universe stories from top creators told in visionary vertical format, designed for your device.

Read comics and stories about Spider-Man, Iron Man, Captain America, Captain Marvel, The Avengers, Thor, Hulk, the X-Men, the Guardians of the Galaxy, Star Wars, Doctor Strange, Deadpool, Thanos, Mysterio, Ant-Man, The Wasp, Black Panther, Wolverine, Hawkeye, Wanda Maximoff, Jessica Jones, the Defenders, Luke Cage, Venom, and many more!

Wondering where to start? Check out endless reading guides curated by Marvel experts to guide you through the last 80 years of the Marvel Universe. Read about comic events that inspired the movies such as the Spider-Verse, Civil War, Thanos and the Infinity Gauntlet, and even Star Wars!

Unlimited downloads allows you to read as many comics as you want offline and on-the-go! Follow your favorite characters, creators and series and get notified when new issues come out! Marvel Unlimited is available on mobile phones, tablets, and anywhere you can access the web.

Key Features:
• Access over 30,000 Marvel comics at your fingertips
• Infinity Comics, in-universe stories from top creators designed for your device
• Endless reading guides
• Unlimited downloads to read anywhere
• Personalized comic book recommendations

• No commitments. Cancel online at any time.

Choose from three different Marvel Unlimited comic subscription plans as follows:

Subscription via iTunes:

Download the app and sign up for your free one-week trial to start reading. If you are enjoying your free trial, do nothing and your membership will automatically renew each month. You can cancel at any time. Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the then-current subscription period. Your payment method associated with your iTunes account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal, as stated above, within 24 hours prior to the end of the then-current billing period. You can manage your subscription and/or turn off auto-renewal by visiting your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Before you download this app, please consider that it may include or support advertising, some of which the Walt Disney Family of Companies may target to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within mobile applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device's advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest-based ads).

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

What is the Bible?
The Bible is the account of God’s action in the world, and his purpose with all creation. The writing of the Bible took place over sixteen centuries and is the work of over forty human authors. It is quite an amazing collection of 66 books with very different styles, all containing the message God desired us to have.

This compilation of booklets contains an astonishing variety of literary styles. It provides many stories about the lives of good and bad people, about battles and journeys, about the life of Jesus, and about early church activity. It comes to us in narratives and dialogues, in proverbs and parables, in songs and allegories, in history and prophecy.
The accounts in the Bible were not generally written down as they occurred. Rather they were told over and over again and handed down through the years, before eventually being written down. Yet the same themes may be found throughout the book. Along with the diversity, there is also remarkable unity throughout.

So what is the Bible? Well, in addition to all the above, the Bible is:

A guide for living life to the full. It gives us a road map for the perilous journey of life. Or to put it another way, on our voyage through life’s ocean, the Bible is an anchor.

A storehouse of wonderful stories for children and grownups. Remember Noah and the ark? Joseph’s coat of many colours? Daniel in the lion’s den? Jonah and the fish? The parables of Jesus? These stories emphasize the triumphs and failures of ordinary people.

A refuge in trouble. People in pain, in suffering, in prison, and in mourning tell how turning to the Bible brought strength in their desperate hour.

A treasury of insight as to who we are. We are not meaningless robots, but we are magnificent creatures of a God who loves us and gives us a purpose and a destiny.

A sourcebook for everyday living. We find standards for our conduct, guidelines for knowing right from wrong, and principles to help us in a confused society where so often “anything goes.”

eBooks (including those with narration) that you have purchased on Amazon will automatically appear in your app.  Kindle Unlimited and Amazon Prime members can select and download eBooks directly in the app.

Bible for Women is a beautifully designed, free mobile application, conceived with the single purpose to inspire and nurture the faith of women across the globe. Rooted in the teachings of the Holy Bible, this app brings the sacred scriptures of the Bible to life in a way that is practical, user-friendly, and easily accessible.

Whether you are in the cozy comfort of your home or managing the challenges of the outside world, our Bible app ensures that spiritual nourishment from the Bible is always at your fingertips. It offers a plethora of empowering tools that cater to the unique spiritual needs and experiences of women who seek guidance from the Bible. Our aim is to support women on their journey towards a deeper relationship with God through the Bible and to fortify their spiritual connections.

Our range of Bible-related features is just as varied as it is extensive:

- Start your day with thoughtfully chosen, inspirational Bible verses that echo the wisdom and spiritual insight typical of women. These Bible verses are handpicked from the Bible to inspire, motivate, and invigorate you, setting a positive tone for your day with the Bible.
- Receive daily reminders for prayers and meditation guides, crafted with the intention to enrich your soul with the teachings of the Bible. These guides offer a structured route for your daily spiritual journey with the Bible, helping you remain focused and connected to God.
- Our Bible Audio feature allows you to soak in scripture readings from the Bible, making it a perfect companion for the modern, busy woman. Whether you're commuting, exercising, or simply unwinding, this Bible feature lets you absorb the teachings of the Bible.
- The Bible app lets you make personal notes and highlight verses from the Bible that touch your heart. This interactive aspect turns your spiritual journey into a deeply personal experience, enabling you to contemplate, internalize, and document your thoughts and feelings about the Bible.
- For those who enjoy a little challenge, our Bible app includes engaging Bible quizzes designed to test and enhance your knowledge of the Bible. These quizzes add a touch of fun while also fostering a better understanding and recall of biblical teachings.

Bible for Women is more than just an app - it's a spiritual partner that effortlessly integrates the solace of the Holy Bible into your daily routine. It ensures that the wisdom of the Holy Bible is always available to you, even in offline mode. Every single feature is thoughtfully crafted to meet you where you are, empowering, supporting, and guiding you on your faith journey with the Bible.

This Bible app creates a direct and uncomplicated path to spiritual nourishment for every woman seeking a deeper bond with God through the Bible. Experience the transformative power of scripture, tailored exclusively for women, with Bible for Women. Download the Bible app today to unlock the sacred wisdom of the Bible and embark on a journey of self-discovery. Explore a world of biblical insight designed just for you, and let the Bible lead you towards a richer, more fulfilling spiritual life.

Kobo seamlessly blends eBooks, audiobooks, and intuitive tools into your daily rhythm. From cozy nights to busy commutes, we keep your place, your pace, and your story alive.

Read and listen seamlessly
Customize fonts, enjoy Night Mode, set a sleep timer for audio playback, and experience natural-sounding text-to-speech for hands-free reading! Read Aloud available on select eBooks only.

Explore before you dive in
Our Guest Mode lets you browse books, save previews, and discover your next favourite read, all without any Kobo account required.

Pick up where you left off
Your bookmarks, highlights, and notes sync automatically across phone, tablet, Kobo eReader, or Kobo Web Reader, so your story always stays with you.

Designed for real life
From road trips with CarPlay to daily routines with our new Listen Bar, Kobo fits seamlessly into your day. Read in 13 languages including English, French, Spanish, German, Portuguese, Italian, Dutch, Turkish, and more.

Why Kobo?
Whether you’re into bestsellers, romance, thrillers, self-development, or audiobooks for your next run, Kobo’s intuitive app helps you rediscover the joy of storytelling.

Download the Kobo Books App and fall in love with reading all over again. Explore, highlight, review, read and listen your way, with full support for iOS accessibility features.

It's great bible study tool. Here you will find:

Bible Concordance:
Alphabet index of all words from the King James Bible (total in app 12839) ("the, and, of" are excluded - don't use them in search query)

Strong's Concordance:
Strong's Hebrew and Greek Dictionaries with information from Hebrew and Greek Lexicons. 
Use numbers in search query to find them. Ex."2424" or "G2424" 
Excluded some Greek words which not used in the Bible - G1400, G1418, G2717, G3203-G3302, G4452 and G5104
All Bible Verses in concordance with clickable Strong's Numbers

KJV Bible with Strong's:
Clickable Strong's Numbers (show/hide mode)
Audio Bible
Daily Verses
Canonical, historical and chronological Reading Plans for 1 Year, 180 and 90 Days
Bookmarks/Notes/Highlights
Multiple verses selection
Synchronization between different devices (in your apple account via iCloud)

app_name: 哔哩哔哩漫画-看小说漫画大全，追书阅读器！动画番剧原作快看
description:
【哔哩哔哩有漫画了！】
海量精品高清正版漫画大全，漫画迷都爱的追漫画神器！看漫画就上哔哩哔哩漫画APP，人气UP主们都在看，一起组队刷哔哩哔哩漫画！
日漫、国漫、韩漫、港漫、欧漫，漫漫都有！提供各种恐怖漫画、搞笑漫画、脑洞漫画等小众原创漫画的动漫之家！
各种番剧/动画的原作日漫同步连载中~抖音快手微博小红书热门讲漫原作连载平台！好看漫画应有尽有！
还能看小说！原创小说连载快，追书更过瘾！

漫画推广合作：gnlab007

【独家热门漫画】
日本番剧原作：《间谍过家家》《蓝色监狱》《葬送的芙莉莲》《香格里拉边境~粪作猎人向神作游戏发起挑战~ 》《狩龙人拉格纳》等
品质国漫：《天官赐福》《妹子太多，只好飞升了》《小魔头暴露啦！》《人间百里锦》等
优质韩漫：《兔子与黑豹的共生关系》《归还者的魔法要特别》《骷髅奶爸》《从1级开始的异世界骑士》等
各种壁纸级漫画，哔哩哔哩漫画提供漫画阅读器供你来读！

【新漫抢先看】
《爱上姐姐的理由》我宣布——年下男就是最香的~~新漫直出，网飞同步上线新剧《李斗娜》原著漫画！裴秀智主演！女频甜宠爱好者真的很爱！
《地域创造者》为了复仇，与魔鬼携手合作…… 可谁知突然开启了一场游戏——想要生存，就得努力了！生存游戏开始了！
《超人的时代》紧急警报！怪物肆虐！ 平凡少年超人拯救人类！热血！超级英雄！硬核和打脸全都有！
《少爷不乖》画风精致高级，偏韩漫的画风，作品口碑和热度均在线。当会长之位被各界大佬视为囊中之物，前会长的小少爷会陷入怎样的境界？

【正版日漫】
超全正版日漫！《鬼灭之刃》、《咒术回战》、《碧蓝之海》、《死神少爷与黑女仆》、《堀与宫村》、《我是蜘蛛又怎样？》、《关于我转生变成史莱姆这档事》、《租借女友》、《辉夜大小姐想让我告白》、《总之就是非常可爱》、《航海王》（海贼王漫画）、《一拳超人》、《名侦探柯南》、《入间同学入魔了！》、《JOJO的奇妙冒险》……你喜欢的，这里都有！
热门樱花动漫之家原作应有尽有，还想看经典樱花日漫？必须有！
《境·界（死神）》《火影忍者》《妖精的尾巴》《驱魔少年》《全职猎人》《家庭教师》《龙珠》《通灵王》《幽游白书》《银魂》《五等分的花嫁》《排球少年!!》…一起看漫画！
嘴馋想吃菠萝包？美食漫画大全不可错过！快看《中华小当家》《美食的俘虏》《网购技能开启异世界美食之旅》《迷宫饭》等樱花漫画大全！
想及时追更当季新番原作漫画？这里也有！
2023年度秋季动画原作等你来看！包括《新网球王子U17》《圣女魔力无所不能》《狩龙人拉格纳》《葬送的芙莉莲》《间谍过家家》《堀与宫村》《头文字D Legend2》《JOJO的奇妙冒险：不灭钻石》《宝可梦 我们的故事》等等！更多优秀漫画等你来发现！

【海量国漫】
晋江文学城TOP作品《魔道祖师》作者墨香铜臭的另一热门小说改编的《天官赐福》官方漫画独家上线哔哩哔哩漫画！
夏达全新作品《步天歌》独家首发！法吉特实力作品《AISHA》上新~
更多精品国漫：《不小心救了江湖公敌》、《两不疑》、《百炼成神》、《罗小黑战记·蓝溪镇》、《反派初始化》、《天宝伏妖录》、《全球高考》、《元龙》、《凡人修仙传》、《小魔头暴露啦！》、《斗罗大陆》、《放开那个女巫》、《战国千年》、 《史上最强赘婿》……各类题材，总有一款适合你！
囊括有妖气、网易漫画平台的人气漫画《镇魂街》、《雏蜂》、《端脑》、《我在皇宫当巨巨》等国漫作品，还有多多猫猫漫画！
在快看漫画连载《DOLO命运胶囊》的漫客作者兔街子，好看漫画新作《街角的向阳花屋》；
《泽上寂寞萤火》漫画岛作者千本，新作《水中飘零之星》；
《贫穷游戏》主笔老妹，新作《我与魔君不可说》；
《61天与你度过一生》漫画人作者沐七，新作恐怖漫画《我知道你的秘密》；
《Sunday》漫画台作者光盐，新作《屋顶的田螺男孩》等快看漫画画风作品；
曾在微博动漫之家连载的《水晶鞋》《伞少女梦谈》；
在知音漫客刊载的《偷星九月天》；
在漫漫漫画连载的《两不疑》《榴花不及春》；
曾在大角虫漫画刊载的橘味漫画《Lily》；
在腾讯动漫之家刊载的《今日的魔女依旧拉胯》均在哔哩哔哩漫画阅读器可看！
同时，各小说阅读器软件的热门作品改编的脑洞漫画大全，也正在哔哩哔哩漫画APP连载中~
如晋江文学城作家木苏里的《全球高考》改编的同名漫画；
长佩文学双男主热门小说《社交温度》《信息素说我们不可能》《你的距离》《落池》《我和我的四个伴舞》等改编的同名漫画；
菠萝包轻小说平台热门小说《好徒儿你就饶了为师伐》《武帝隐居之后的生活》等改编的菠萝包出品的同名漫画；
不可能的世界的《忘川夜行》《从前只有小骷髅》；
飞卢小说网的《我丢！原来主播在修仙》《我被s级加密了》；
纵横中文网的《我只有两千五百岁》《大国名厨》；
橙光出品的《蓝宝石般的被害妄想少女》；
七猫小说平台的《凰妃倾天下》《最强学霸系统》；
轻之文库的《商业系天职的战斗法则》《涩系大小姐废宅养成计划》；
17K小说网的《修罗武神》；
刺猬猫轻小说平台的《好感度刷满之后》；
书耽网平台改编的《与他正面对决的日子》；
起点读书平台作者猫腻的热门小说改编的《大道朝天》同名漫画；
还有起点中文网热门小说《全职高手》《全职法师》《夜的命名术》《凡人修仙传》、《我家老婆来自一千年前》阅文集团热门小说《诡秘之主》《希灵帝国》《赘婿》等改编的同名漫画！

【优质韩漫】
叮咚漫画之家的新大门打开了！
《我独自盗墓》、《我是继母，但是女儿太可爱了》、《骷髅骑士没能守住副本》、《装备我最强》等热门韩漫作品独家连载中！
热门韩剧《金秘书为什么这样》《W：两个世界》《便利店新星》原作韩漫也能在哔哩哔哩漫画APP里看到！看韩剧原作漫画不止在咚漫，B漫也很多哦！还有很多咚漫没有的独家韩漫，B漫也有！

【小众港漫、精致欧漫】
经典港漫《海虎》、欧漫《父与子》《疯狂山脉》、美漫《变形金刚》漫威漫画等，满足你的特定漫画口味！

【VOMIC有声漫】
喜欢在猫耳FM听广播剧？除了声音外，想看漫画画面？vomic有声漫满足你！
咚咚咚漫画新世界欢迎你！
《不小心救了江湖公敌》《恶人想要抢救一下》《捡到男鬼后脱单了》《并不是我想当秘书》等有声漫画已上线！人气声优（CV）马正阳X文森，赵毅X林予曦，羊仔X郑希等人倾情演绎~
不仅是个小说漫画阅读器软件，还是个有声漫播放器！

【原创小说】
小破站原创漫画看完不过瘾，快看小说！和菠萝包轻小说平台改编的漫画一样，这里能看到哔漫拷贝漫画的原作小说！开启小说第一弹！
热门漫画小说原作《娘子竟是未来暴君女帝》《这个天道不昏庸》《圣女小姐请停止你的奇怪脑补!》均在连载中！哔哩哔哩漫画APP适配小说阅读器，小说连载更快，看剧情更爽！

【多重福利】
新人登录即送券，官方福利多又香！
快看我们的登录福利！
欢迎关注B站官方帐号@哔哩哔哩漫画

【哔哩哔哩漫画荣誉】
2019年9月，哔哩哔哩漫画获得CACC第16届中国动漫金龙奖“最佳动漫与游戏平台奖”奖项；
2020年8月，哔哩哔哩漫画发表声明，已经与国内35家漫画汉化组达成合作；
2020年9月，哔哩哔哩漫画正式与欧洲最大的漫画出版集团达高集团达成战略合作，成为国内首个引入欧洲漫画的正版漫画平台；
2021年9月，哔哩哔哩漫画3部独家漫画作品获得第18届中国动漫金龙奖奖项；
2022年12月，哔哩哔哩漫画3部作品获得第19届中国动漫金龙奖奖项：
《镇魂街》获最具影响力奖、《战国千年》获最具IP价值奖、《街角的向阳花屋》获最具破圈潜力奖。

[连续包月畅读卡说明]

2、价格15元/月
3、购买畅读卡连续包月的账号,会在每个月到期前24小时,自动在iTunes账户扣费并延长1个月畅读卡有效期
4、如需取消订阅,请手动打开苹果手机“设置”-进入
iTunes Store与 App Store-->点击AppleID"选择“查看Apple ID”进入“账户设置”页面,点击“订阅”选择畅读卡连续包月取消订阅即可.如未在订阅期结束的至少24小时前关闭订阅,此订阅将会自动续订。
5、畅读卡服务协议:https://manga.bilibili.com/eden/coupon-package-agreement.html 畅读卡自动续费服务规则: https://manga.bilibili.com/eden/coupon-package-renew-agreement.html

Shanghai Hehehe Culture Communication Co.,Ltd

Discover the "Holy Bible" App - Your Gateway to Spiritual Growth
Embark on a transformative faith journey with the "Holy Bible" app, a powerful companion designed to uplift and inspire. Immerse yourself in endless possibilities as you explore captivating features to enhance your spiritual experience. From engaging Bible study sessions to enlightening conversations with an AI priest, from exhilarating trivia quizzes to serene moments of prayer, "Holy Bible" is the ultimate app for every devout believer.
Unlock the Power of Prayer
Experience a profound connection with the divine through the app's immersive prayer platform. Engage in morning and night prayers with carefully curated verses and uplifting prayers that resonate with your heart's desires. Connect with God anytime, anywhere, and express your thoughts and aspirations.
Elevate Your Bible Reading
Immerse yourself in the wisdom of the Bible with the personalized reading experience. Tailor your journey to suit your preferences by creating notes, highlights, and bookmarks. Whether you're at the gym or enjoying a moment of tranquility, listen to Bible audios to enrich your understanding. With offline access, delve into scriptures without relying on a network connection.
Enlightenment With AI Priest
Engage with your AI priest through the app. Seamlessly blend technology with spirituality as you receive invaluable guidance and answers to your deepest questions. This feature facilitates Bible study and supports clarity on your spiritual path.
Ignite Your Mind with Bible Quiz
Stimulate your intellect and relax your soul with Bible trivia quizzes. Whether you seek a momentary escape or a brain-teasing challenge, the app offers an array of quizzes to test your knowledge while providing a well-deserved respite. Unwind, recharge, and deepen your connection to the Word in an interactive way.
Embrace Guided Study Plans
Cultivate a consistent study and prayer routine with the comprehensive plans. Choose from themed study plans for personal growth. Receive reminders and notifications to nourish your soul with divine wisdom.
Immerse Yourself in Bible Jigsaw
Experience the beauty of churches around the world through captivating Bible quiz games and activities. Collect jigsaw pieces, unlocking stunning views of churches. Let the splendor of these images further enrich your spiritual exploration.
Record Your Journey With God
Capture the essence of your spiritual odyssey using the app. Document your interactions with God, cherishing every moment spent seeking His heart and communicating through prayer. Witness the transformative power of devotion.
Key Features:
- Personalize prayer experience and communicate directly with God.
- Engage in insightful conversations with your AI priest, exploring biblical knowledge.
- Test your learning and deepen understanding with engaging Bible quizzes.
- Foster a commitment to study and personal growth with supportive features.
- Share impactful verses with friends and loved ones effortlessly.
- Create visually stunning scripture-sharing images.
- Develop a daily habit of study and prayer through the habit-forming function.
- Immerse yourself in personalized reading experiences, choosing fonts, backgrounds, and generating personalized notes.
- Experience the Bible come to life with the audio version, perfect for moments of relaxation or exercise.
- Embark on theme-based study plans, deepening understanding.
- Track your spiritual growth, celebrating progress.

Read iconic comic books like Superman, Batman, The Witcher, Invincible, The Boys, Transformers, Hellboy, The Walking Dead, The Umbrella Academy, and more—alongside exciting creator-made comics, manga, webcomics, and graphic novels.


NEW BOOKS DROP WEEKLY
Find new and interesting comics featured every week. Explore our library of 100,000+ releases through curated collections and see which comic books, creators, and themes are trending. Your next favorite is just a tap away.


GC VERTICAL ORIGINALS
Experience amazing comic book stories reimagined for vertical scroll. With over 1,200+ episodes across 30+ series, enjoy daily free episodes and new series weekly from top indie publishers and creators.


350+ PUBLISHERS AND THOUSANDS OF CREATORS
Enjoy comics from publishers including DC, Image Comics, Dark Horse, BOOM! Studios, ONI Press, TOKYOPOP, Mad Cave, and more. Read titles like Justice League, Superman, Nightwing, Joker, The Sandman, Stranger Things, Invincible, Power Rangers, Transformers, The Boys, The Walking Dead, and thousands more.


READING EXPERIENCE YOU'LL LOVE
Customize your experience—whether on phone or tablet, vertical scroll or double-page layout. Engage with comics your way, comment, follow creators, and jump between chapters with ease. For many titles, enjoy our panel-to-panel reading mode for a more cinematic experience.


ADVANCED SEARCH AND DISCOVERY
Find exactly what you’re looking for with powerful filtering by genre, art style, themes, format, audience, and more. Explore by dedicated publisher channels and discover new comic favorites beyond the algorithm.


OFFLINE READING
Take your comics on the go. Download and read offline with a GlobalComix Gold subscription.


TRACK TITLES & ORGANIZE COMICS
Bookmark your comic books with statuses like “Reading,” “On Hold,” or “Read Later.” Get notified about new releases from your favorite comics and creators.


CELEBRATE COMICS AND THE PEOPLE WHO CREATE THEM
GlobalComix is a creator-first platform where publishers and artists can publish directly and earn revenue. Up to 70% of your subscription fee supports the comics you love.


Join us and shape the future of comicbook storytelling.


If you’ve enjoyed reading on platforms like Comixology, you’ll find GlobalComix a fresh, modern experience—built for discovery, community, and reading your way.

Давайте знакомиться, мы — Читай-город! В нашем приложении, которое связывает интернет-магазин и более 500 книжных по всей стране, можно:

– Покупать книги, сувениры, канцелярию себе или в подарок. Можно воспользоваться услугой «Забрать за 1 час», выбрав самый удобный для вас способ получения. Или оформить экспресс-доставку — чтобы получить заветный томик скорее.

– Делать предзаказы на новинки. Многие из них есть только у нас, причём с эксклюзивными подарками!

– Получать рекомендации через сервис «Я в магазине». Выберите Читай-город, в котором находитесь, и мы покажем его новинки и топы — указав стеллаж и полку. Или введите название книги, которая интересует, чтобы узнать, где она стоит. Ещё можем посоветовать вам историю почти по любому запросу. Например, что-то о котиках ;)

– Быстро узнавать об акциях, скидках, получать и тратить бонусы.

– Выбирать книги на основе наших статей и советов от искусственного интеллекта CHIT-Ai. Он проанализирует, чем интересовались, и предложит истории специально для вас! 

– Купить электронный сертификат, который можно использовать и у нас в магазинах, и точно угадать с подарком — есть варианты в разных номиналах и дизайнах. Можем даже подсказать с пожеланием.

Программа лояльности Книголов

Книголов — единая программа лояльности Читай-города, Буквоеда, book24.ruи Литрес. С ней  вы сможете копить бонусы и оплачивать ими до 100% от стоимости покупки.

Фишки программы лояльности:

– Подарки для новых участников: 50 бонусов за регистрацию на кассе и 50 бонусов за подписку на рассылки. 

– Кешбэк до 15% за покупки. Чем больше покупаете – тем выше кешбэк. А для клиентов с Литрес Подпиской он специальный, целых 20%!

– Единый счёт: копите и тратьте бонусы на сайте, в приложении или в магазинах нашей сети, а ещё в Буквоеде, Литрес, Гоголь-Моголе и на сайте book24.ru.

– Простые условия: 1 бонус = 1 рубль. Бонусами можно оплатить до 100% от стоимости покупок.

– Секретные скидки и другие предложения для владельцев бонусной карты.

The Function of the app is to provide content of listed hymns and related verses, marking favourites hymn verses.

The New King James Version (NKJV) stands as an English translation of the Bible. Crafted by Bible scholars, the translation's primary objective was to use the earliest and highest quality manuscripts available. Another crucial aspect was ensuring that the Bible was conveyed in easily understood modern English.

NKJV Bible Offline simplifies daily connections with God, serving as a lightweight and offline companion for carrying the NKJV Holy Bible wherever you travel.

NKJV Bible Offline, developed by YouVersion, is a nimble Bible application ideal for offline use when lacking an internet connection. It remains entirely cost-free, devoid of ads or in-app purchases, facilitating focused study of the Holy Bible. This app incorporates the favored and easily comprehensible NKJV Bible version. Additionally, it offers a complimentary audio Bible for listening.

Key Features:

NKJV Bible Offline: A compact and swift tool for carrying the Holy Bible on the go.
Ad-Free: NKJV Bible Offline is devoid of annoying ads, having just a little banner ads providing an uninterrupted and free experience.
NKJV Bible: An offline Bible application granting access to any chapter or verse of the popular NKJV Bible without an internet connection.
Additional Features:

Highlight and Save: Identify and save preferred verses in the NKJV Bible to retain learned insights.

Verse of the Day: Commence each day with inspiration from a daily Bible verse.

Bible Quotes: Dedicate time to prayer through the Daily Prayer feature.

Share Verses: Generate visually appealing images featuring Bible verses for sharing with friends and family.
